air_strike.title: Air Strike
air_strike.shortDescription: Automated, randomized rocket strikes with player alerts
air_strike.description: Triggers periodic airstrikes over predefined map locations. Rockets spawn at random heights and trajectories, accompanied by player warnings, creating dynamic map hazards.

ammo_resupply.title: Ammo Resupply
ammo_resupply.shortDescription: Resupply ammo, grenades, and energy batteries on command
ammo_resupply.description: Provides a configurable player command to replenish ammo, magazines, frag/plasma grenades, and battery. Includes cooldowns and optional permission restrictions.

april_fools_chat.title: April Fools - Chat
april_fools_chat.shortDescription: Randomly reroutes player chat to others
april_fools_chat.description: Prank script that makes other players 'speak' your chat messages when triggered by certain words. Includes permission-level checks to limit who can trigger the effect.

april_fools_word_shuffler.title: April Fools - Word Shuffler
april_fools_word_shuffler.description: Adds a 1 in 3 chance that any chat message will be randomly scrambled, creating humorous confusion. Perfect for April Fools' Day pranks in-game. Players' messages remain readable but become amusingly jumbled.

auto_troll.title: Auto Troll
auto_troll.shortDescription: Comprehensive server trolling toolkit with 17+ prank features
auto_troll.description: A powerful all-in-one trolling script with 17+ customizable prank features to mess with players. Includes silent kills, damage modifiers, chat scramblers, teleportation, forced vehicle exits, ammo manipulation, fake messages, inverted controls, and more. Fully configurable with permissions and target filters for controlled chaos.

beep_on_join.title: Beep On Join
beep_on_join.description: Plays a system beep sound whenever a new player joins the server, providing an audible notification of player connections. Useful for server admins who want audio cues for player activity without visual monitoring.

capture_the_flag.title: Capture The Flag
capture_the_flag.shortDescription: Adds CTF gameplay to Slayer modes
capture_the_flag.description: Transforms any Slayer (FFA or Team) game into a Capture the Flag experience. Spawns a single flag that players must return to any base to score points. Features configurable scoring, flag respawning, capture points for all standard maps, and team/FFA support. Perfect for adding objective-based gameplay to traditional deathmatch modes.

color_changer.title: Player Color Changer
color_changer.shortDescription: Allows players to customize their armor color
color_changer.description: Enables players with sufficient permissions to change their armor color using a simple command. Offers 18 different color options from white to salmon. Maintains color consistency through respawns while respecting game mechanics. Includes admin-level restrictions for controlled customization.

color_reservation.title: VIP Color Reservation
color_reservation.shortDescription: Reserves armor colors for VIP players based on their unique hash
color_reservation.description: Allows server administrators to reserve specific armor colors for VIP players by configuring their unique player hashes. Supports all 18 armor colors in FFA Slayer mode only. Automatically assigns random colors to non-VIP players while preserving reserved colors for authorized users through respawns. Includes protection against color conflicts.

custom_teleports.title: Custom Teleporters
custom_teleports.shortDescription: Configurable instant teleport points for any map
custom_teleports.description: Creates customizable teleportation zones that instantly transport players between locations on the same map. Supports map-specific configurations with adjustable activation radius and destination points. Optional crouch-only activation prevents accidental teleports. Perfect for creating shortcuts, secret passages, or gameplay variations in any map.

damage_multiplier.title: Damage Multiplier
damage_multiplier.description: Allows server administrators to dynamically adjust individual players' damage output with a simple command. Features configurable multiplier ranges (1-10x), optional reset functionality, and permission-based access control. Perfect for balancing gameplay, creating special events, or testing combat scenarios.

deployable_mines.title: Deployable Mines
deployable_mines.shortDescription: Adds tactical mine deployment for vehicles
deployable_mines.description: Introduces deployable explosive mines that players can strategically place while driving compatible vehicles. Features configurable mine limits per life, timed despawn, adjustable detonation radius, and team damage options. Mines persist through player deaths and can be used to create defensive perimeters or ambush points. Includes visual feedback and mine counters for players.

expressions.title: Fun Chat Expressions
expressions.description: Adds playful, moderated chat commands for expressing emotions like anger (!anger), taunting opponents (!taunt), or mild frustration (!cuss). Features multiple randomized responses for each command while maintaining player identity in chat. Perfect for adding personality to gameplay without offensive language. Fully configurable with custom phrase lists and output formatting.

flashlight_vehicle_entry.title: Flashlight Vehicle Entry
flashlight_vehicle_entry.shortDescription: Enter vehicles by aiming and using flashlight
flashlight_vehicle_entry.description: Adds an alternative vehicle entry system where players can enter unoccupied vehicles by aiming at them and pressing their flashlight key. Supports all standard Halo vehicles with configurable options. Provides more intuitive vehicle boarding while maintaining game balance. Works seamlessly with existing vehicle mechanics.

flip_a_coin.title: Coin Flip Simulator
flip_a_coin.description: Adds a fun virtual coin flip command that simulates thousands of flips instantly and displays detailed statistics. Features configurable flip counts, probability percentages, and execution timing. Provides entertaining random results while demonstrating probability concepts in real-time. Simple permission system controls access.

flying_vehicles.title: Flying Vehicles Mod
flying_vehicles.description: Transforms standard ground vehicles into flying machines with a simple command. Supports configurable vehicle selection, permission-based access control, and automatic reset options. Perfect for creating custom game modes or just having fun with unconventional vehicle physics. Includes safety features to prevent conflicts with normal gameplay.

force_chat.title: Force Chat
force_chat.description: Allows administrators to make any player appear to send chat messages. Useful for roleplaying scenarios, announcements, or moderation purposes. Features permission controls, customizable message formatting, and proper server prefix handling. Note: Fake messages may be detectable by some client modifications.

gravity_gun.title: Gravity Gun Mod
gravity_gun.description: Adds a physics-based gravity gun that lets players pick up, carry, and launch objects with realistic mass-based physics. Supports vehicles, weapons, equipment and devices with configurable pickup range, rotation speed, and launch velocity. Includes cooldown timers, mass restrictions, and permission controls for balanced gameplay. Perfect for creating custom game modes or just having fun with physics.

grenade_launcher.title: Grenade Launcher Mod
grenade_launcher.description: Transforms standard weapons and vehicle armaments into grenade launchers with configurable projectile physics. Features map-specific grenade types, adjustable velocity settings, and toggleable activation. Supports multiple weapon types with realistic ballistic behavior. Includes permission controls and optional auto-disable on death for balanced gameplay.

headshot_blocker.title: Headshot Blocker
headshot_blocker.description: Prevents all headshot damage while maintaining normal body shot mechanics. Works across all weapons and gametypes. Ideal for creating more casual gameplay experiences or balancing weapon mechanics. Simple and lightweight implementation with no configuration needed.

health_regeneration.title: Health Regeneration
health_regeneration.description: Implements a dynamic health regeneration system that gradually restores player health when below maximum. Features intelligent scaling that regenerates faster when health is lower. Lightweight implementation with minimal performance impact. Perfect for creating more forgiving gameplay experiences or custom game modes.

items_from_heaven.title: Items From Heaven
items_from_heaven.shortDescription: Random weapon/vehicle spawns across the map
items_from_heaven.description: Spawns random weapons and vehicles at predefined map locations at configurable intervals. Features include adjustable spawn timing, automatic cleanup of unused items, and support for all standard Halo weapons and vehicles. Perfect for creating dynamic gameplay experiences or custom game modes where equipment availability changes throughout the match.

kill_counter.title: Kill Counter
kill_counter.description: Displays current kill counts to players after each successful elimination. Features customizable message formatting and automatic tracking. Lightweight implementation with minimal performance impact. Perfect for competitive matches where players want immediate feedback on their performance.

killer_reward.title: Killer Reward System
killer_reward.description: Rewards successful kills by spawning random weapons or equipment at the victim's death location. Features configurable drop tables, consecutive kill requirements, and multiple reward modes (weapons-only, equipment-only, or mixed). Includes kill streak tracking and customizable drop chances. Perfect for creating dynamic combat scenarios where players are rewarded for consistent performance.

market_account_saving.title: Market Economy System
market_account_saving.shortDescription: Persistent player economy with purchasable perks
market_account_saving.description: Implements a comprehensive in-game economy where players earn currency through combat performance and can spend it on temporary perks. Features account persistence, configurable rewards/penalties, admin controls, and a marketplace with cooldowns. Supports perks like god mode, camouflage, damage boosts and more with JSON-based account saving. Perfect for creating progression systems in persistent servers.

market_no_account_saving.title: Market (no account saving)
market_no_account_saving.description: Players earn money through gameplay to purchase temporary perks. All purchases reset when the player dies or the game ends. Includes admin money management commands.

melee_kicker.title: Melee Kicker
melee_kicker.shortDescription: Instantly kicks players killed by melee attacks
melee_kicker.description: A humorous mod where any melee kill results in the victim being kicked from the server. Can be configured to only allow admins to perform melee-kicks. Works with all melee weapons including flags and oddball.

mode_destroy_gun.title: Destroy Gun Mode
mode_destroy_gun.shortDescription: Weapon mode that destroys objects on impact
mode_destroy_gun.description: Allows players with permission to toggle a mode where their weapon fire destroys any object it hits (vehicles, weapons, equipment). Includes object type feedback and admin controls.

mode_enter_gun.title: Enter Gun Mode
mode_enter_gun.shortDescription: Vehicle entry system using weapon fire
mode_enter_gun.description: Allows players to enter vehicles by shooting them when the mode is active. Supports Warthog, Ghost, Banshee, Scorpion, and other vehicles. Includes admin toggle controls and visual feedback.

mode_spawn_gun.title: Spawn Gun Mode
mode_spawn_gun.shortDescription: Creative mode that spawns objects when firing
mode_spawn_gun.description: Allows players to spawn various game objects (weapons, vehicles, powerups) by shooting. Includes 40+ spawnable objects, automatic cleanup on death, and manual cleanup commands. Perfect for creative gameplay and custom maps.

mvp_join_alerts.title: MVP Join Alerts
mvp_join_alerts.shortDescription: Personalized welcome messages for VIP players
mvp_join_alerts.description: Broadcasts custom welcome messages when special players join, with unique messages for MVPs and random generic greetings for regular players. Supports identification by IP, hash, or exact name. Fully configurable messages and prefixes.

player_vanish.title: Player Vanish System
player_vanish.shortDescription: Advanced player invisibility and teleportation system
player_vanish.description: Provides comprehensive vanish functionality including invisibility, invincibility, speed boosts, and teleportation. Features persistent vanish states, vehicle hiding, radar concealment, and customizable messages. Supports both self-vanish and admin-controlled vanishing of other players.

portal_gun_type_1.title: Portal Gun (Vehicle-Compatible)
portal_gun_type_1.shortDescription: Shoot-to-teleport system that works in vehicles
portal_gun_type_1.description: Advanced teleportation system that lets players instantly teleport to where they shoot. Works both on foot and in vehicles. Features admin controls, persistent states, and customizable messages.

portal_gun_type_2.title: Portal Gun (Crouch-Activated)
portal_gun_type_2.description: Teleportation system requiring players to crouch before shooting to activate. Features admin controls, persistent states, and customizable messages. Designed for on-foot gameplay only.

proximity_chat.title: Proximity Chat System
proximity_chat.shortDescription: Localized voice chat with configurable range
proximity_chat.description: Implements realistic proximity chat where players can only communicate within a set distance. Features per-map range settings, dead player communication options, team/vehicle chat modes, and admin controls for range adjustment.

rage_quit.title: Rage Quit Detector
rage_quit.shortDescription: Detects and announces rage quits after deaths
rage_quit.description: Identifies when players quit after being killed or during short play sessions, broadcasting humorous announcements. Features configurable detection windows and customizable messages.

random_fact_generator.title: Chuck Norris Fact Generator
random_fact_generator.shortDescription: Periodically shares Chuck Norris facts from an API
random_fact_generator.description: Fetches and displays random Chuck Norris facts at intervals. Can optionally replace Chuck's name with player names. Requires HTTP client plugin and JSON library.

random_name.title: Random Name Generator
random_name.shortDescription: Replaces player names with random alternatives
random_name.description: Assigns configurable random names to players based on name categories. Maintains unique name assignments during gameplay sessions.

rcon_chat.title: RCON Chat Redirect
rcon_chat.shortDescription: Redirects chat messages to RCON console
rcon_chat.description: Displays all in-game chat messages in the RCON interface with player IDs. Supports team/vehicle chat differentiation and message filtering.

replace_weapon_projectile.title: Projectile Replacement System
replace_weapon_projectile.shortDescription: Modifies weapon projectiles with custom effects
replace_weapon_projectile.description: Allows server admins to replace default weapon projectiles with custom ones, including damage multiplier adjustments. Supports all standard weapons and vehicles.

rocket_launcher_malfunction.title: Rocket Launcher Malfunction
rocket_launcher_malfunction.shortDescription: Random explosive failures for rocket launcher users
rocket_launcher_malfunction.description: Causes rocket launchers to spontaneously explode at random intervals, creating chaotic gameplay moments. Features configurable explosion frequency and notification messages.

roll_the_dice.title: Roll The Dice Mini-Game
roll_the_dice.shortDescription: Random effect generator with 5 possible outcomes
roll_the_dice.description: Players can gamble with a chance-based system that provides random rewards or punishments. Includes vehicle spawning, weapon assignments, inventory wipes, temporary shields, and player launches.

self_destruction.title: Self-Destruct Mechanic
self_destruction.description: Allows players to trigger a powerful explosion centered on themselves using the flashlight key. Features cooldown timer, visual effects, and configurable projectile count.

server_fun_plus.title: Admin Fun Commands Pack
server_fun_plus.description: Provides administrators with a suite of entertaining commands including player rocketing, forced chat, fake join/quit messages, random teleportation, slapping, spamming, zapping, god broadcasting, nuking, color changing, and client crashing.

shield_regen.title: Instant Shield Regeneration
shield_regen.shortDescription: Immediate shield recharge after taking damage
shield_regen.description: Removes the shield recharge delay, causing shields to begin regenerating immediately after taking damage. Configurable delay timer.

spawn_from_sky.title: Aerial Spawn System
spawn_from_sky.shortDescription: Players spawn high above map with parachute effect
spawn_from_sky.description: Drops players from the sky at spawn locations with temporary god mode until landing. Includes pre-configured spawn points for all standard maps.

spawn_protection.title: Spawn Protection System
spawn_protection.description: Grants players a configurable period of invulnerability after spawning. Optional setting to prevent protected players from dealing damage.

spawn_where_killed.title: Death Location Respawn
spawn_where_killed.shortDescription: Players respawn at their death locations
spawn_where_killed.description: Modifies spawn system so players reappear exactly where they died, creating intense revenge opportunities. Works for both foot and vehicle deaths.

sprint_system.title: Advanced Sprint Mechanic
sprint_system.description: Adds realistic sprinting with stamina management, speed boosts, exhaustion penalties, and HUD feedback. Activated by flashlight key with fully customizable parameters.

stun_grenades.title: Stun Grenade Modifier
stun_grenades.description: Modifies all grenade types to temporarily slow victims on explosion. Features different duration effects for frag, plasma, and stuck plasma grenades.

super_bloodgulch.title: Super Bloodgulch
super_bloodgulch.description: Overhauls weapon and vehicle stats for an intense gameplay experience. Modifies damage, projectile speed, explosion radius, and other properties for most weapons and vehicles in the game.

super_jump.title: Super Jump
super_jump.description: Allows players to jump significantly higher than normal with a configurable cooldown period between jumps. Can be toggled on/off with commands.

tactical_airstrike.title: Tactical Airstrike
tactical_airstrike.description: Players who achieve a 5-kill streak can call in devastating airstrikes with three different targeting modes. Features map-specific strike locations, configurable projectile counts, and team-based restrictions where applicable.

tactical_insertion.title: Tactical Insertion
tactical_insertion.shortDescription: Set custom spawn points during gameplay
tactical_insertion.description: Allows players to set their next spawn location using a command. Features limited uses per game, coordinate precision, and spawn confirmation messages. Players must be alive to set their insertion point.

taunt_on_end_messages.title: Taunt Messages
taunt_on_end_messages.shortDescription: Playful taunts based on player performance
taunt_on_end_messages.description: Displays humorous taunting messages to players at game end based on their kill count. Ranges from gentle ribbing for poor performance to backhanded compliments for better scores.

taunt_your_players_v1.title: Player Taunts V1
taunt_your_players_v1.description: Displays funny or provocative messages to players in-game.

taunt_your_players_v2.title: Player Taunts V2
taunt_your_players_v2.shortDescription: Advanced taunt system with customizable messages
taunt_your_players_v2.description: Enhanced version featuring fully configurable taunt messages with variables, message alignment options, and organized kill-based responses. Supports multiple messages per kill threshold and excludes suicides/vehicle deaths from triggering taunts.

tea_bagging.title: Tea Bagging Detection
tea_bagging.shortDescription: Automatically detects and announces tea-bagging behavior
tea_bagging.description: Monitors player crouching near corpses and triggers humorous announcements when tea-bagging is detected. Features configurable detection radius, required crouch count, cooldown periods, and a variety of customizable taunt messages. Includes admin toggle functionality.

truce_system.shortDescription: Allows players to establish temporary peace agreements
truce_system.description: Enables players to request, accept, or deny truces with opponents, preventing mutual damage while active. Features request management, configurable privilege levels, persistent truce data across maps, and comprehensive status tracking. Includes commands for managing active truces and pending requests.

uber_taxi.title: Uber (TAXI)
uber_taxi.description: Allows players to summon themselves into teammates' vehicles with configurable seat priority, cooldowns, and restrictions. Supports vehicle validation, auto-ejection, crouch activation, and call limits.

vanish_lurker.title: Vanish (Lurker)
vanish_lurker.description: Provides comprehensive vanish mode with configurable stealth features including invisibility, camouflage, speed boosts, invincibility, radar hiding, and objective restrictions. Includes warning system for objective carriers and admin controls.

weapon_durability_jam_system.title: Weapon Durability & Jam System
weapon_durability_jam_system.shortDescription: Realistic weapon degradation and malfunction mechanics
weapon_durability_jam_system.description: Implements comprehensive weapon durability system with progressive decay, jamming mechanics, and weapon-specific failure rates. Features include melee-based jam clearing, ammo state preservation, overheat prevention, and configurable degradation rates per weapon type.

weighted_weapons.title: Weighted Weapons System
weighted_weapons.shortDescription: Realistic weapon weight and stamina mechanics
weighted_weapons.description: Implements weapon-based movement penalties with configurable weight values for each weapon type. Features a comprehensive stamina system that depletes during movement and regenerates while resting, with visual feedback. Includes exhaustion penalties and supports both individual weapon and combined loadout weight calculations.

attrition.title: Attrition
attrition.description: Players compete in teams, aiming to reduce the opposing team's numbers to zero.

cranked.title: Cranked
cranked.description: Players gain speed and urgency after each kill, encouraging constant action.

divide_and_conquer.title: Divide & Conquer
divide_and_conquer.description: Teams capture zones and outmaneuver opponents to control the map.

frag_nation.title: Frag Nation
frag_nation.description: Players rack up points by eliminating enemies in a free-for-all or team setting.

gun_game.title: Gun Game
gun_game.description: Players progress through a series of weapons with each kill, aiming to reach the final weapon first.

hunter_prey.title: Hunter-Prey
hunter_prey.description: One team hunts while the other team tries to survive or complete objectives.

juggernaut.title: Juggernaut
juggernaut.description: One player becomes the Juggernaut with enhanced abilities, while others try to take them down.

kill_confirmed.title: Kill Confirmed
kill_confirmed.description: Players must collect fallen enemies' tags to score points for their team.

melee_attack.title: Melee Attack
melee_attack.description: Players can only eliminate opponents using melee attacks, emphasizing agility and timing.

needles_galore.title: Needles Galore
needles_galore.description: Players exclusively use Needlers to score kills and dominate the map.

one_in_the_chamber.title: One In The Chamber
one_in_the_chamber.description: Players have only one bullet per life, making every shot critical.

parkour_timer.title: Parkour Timer
parkour_timer.description: Players race through parkour challenges while being timed, aiming for fastest completion.

sabotage.title: Sabotage
sabotage.description: Players aim to destroy objectives or equipment while preventing the opposing team from doing the same.

shotty_snipes.title: Shotty-Snipes
shotty_snipes.description: Players alternate between shotguns and sniper rifles, testing versatility and positioning.

survival_slayer.title: Survival Slayer
survival_slayer.description: Teams fight until one survives; focus is on endurance and strategic elimination.

swat.title: Swat
swat.description: Players face off with increased damage and no shields, emphasizing accuracy and tactics.

tag.title: Tag
tag.description: Players try to tag opponents or avoid being tagged, turning the map into a giant playground.

team_defender.title: Team Defender
team_defender.description: Teams defend their area while attempting to capture or attack opposing zones.

admin_add_me.title: Admin Add Me
admin_add_me.description: Allows authorized users to automatically grant themselves admin privileges.

admin_chat.title: Admin Chat
admin_chat.shortDescription: Custom chat channel for server admins
admin_chat.description: Toggleable admin-only chat system for communication among server administrators.

admin_messages.title: Admin Messages
admin_messages.description: Announces a special message to all players when a VIP admin joins the server.

afk_system.title: AFK System
afk_system.description: Monitors player activity and automatically kicks players who remain AFK beyond a configurable threshold.

aimbot_scores.title: Aimbot Scores
aimbot_scores.shortDescription: View player accuracy and bot-score stats with simple commands.
aimbot_scores.description: Displays accuracy and bot-score statistics for players with customizable filters.

anti_aimbot.title: Anti Aimbot
anti_aimbot.description: Monitors player accuracy and suspicious aiming patterns to identify and mitigate aimbot usage.

anti_camp_v1.title: Anti-Camp V1
anti_camp_v1.description: Detects players camping in restricted areas and applies warnings or penalties.

anti_camp_v2.title: Anti-Camp V2
anti_camp_v2.description: Enhanced camping detection with configurable zones, timers, and punishments.

anti_impersonator.title: Anti Impersonator
anti_impersonator.shortDescription: Prevent players from impersonating clan/community members
anti_impersonator.description: Detects and removes players attempting to impersonate trusted members, supporting kick/ban and logging.

auto_lead.title: Auto Lead
auto_lead.description: Automatically toggles SAPP's lead mode based on specified map and game type configurations

auto_message.title: Auto Message
auto_message.description: Automatically sends configurable messages to all players at set intervals.

auto_team_balance.title: Auto Team Balance
auto_team_balance.description: Reassigns players to maintain even teams based on player count and skill levels.

ban_on_sight.title: Ban On Sight
ban_on_sight.description: Allows admins to immediately ban players upon detection or suspicion of rule violations.

block_duplicate_ips.title: Block Duplicate IPs
block_duplicate_ips.shortDescription: Prevent multiple connections from same IP
block_duplicate_ips.description: Blocks new connections if the IP is already connected, useful to prevent multi-clienting or alt accounts.

block_replace_objects.title: Block or Replace Objects
block_replace_objects.description: Blocks or replaces unwanted in-game objects to maintain map integrity or prevent exploits.

block_team_damage.title: Block Team Damage
block_team_damage.description: Prevents players from damaging teammates, configurable per team or globally.

chat_ids.title: Chat IDs
chat_ids.description: Shows player IDs in the chat for easier identification.

clear_chat.title: Clear Chat
clear_chat.description: Clears the server chat for all players instantly.

client_crasher.title: Client Crasher
client_crasher.description: This tool will crash clients to the desktop

command_spy.title: Command Spy
command_spy.description: This tool will spy on player commands

console_logo.title: Console Logo
console_logo.description: Shows a custom ASCII logo in the server console upon startup.

countdown_timer.title: Countdown Timer
countdown_timer.description: Displays a configurable countdown timer to players for events or map changes.

custom_colors.title: Custom Colors
custom_colors.description: Allows modification of in-game colors for players or teams.

custom_command_cooldowns.title: Custom Command Cooldowns
custom_command_cooldowns.description: Configurable cooldown periods for commands to prevent spam or abuse.

custom_loadouts.title: Custom Loadouts
custom_loadouts.description: Players receive predefined weapon or equipment loadouts upon spawn or command execution.

custom_vehicle_spawner.title: Custom Vehicle Spawner
custom_vehicle_spawner.description: Replaces default vehicle spawns with custom locations and configurations.

custom_wdel.title: Custom Object Deleter
custom_wdel.description: Modified weapon deletion that preserves flag/oddball items

cyborg_spawner.title: Cyborg Spawner
cyborg_spawner.shortDescription: Spawn multiplayer cyborgs at preset map locations.
cyborg_spawner.description: Automatically spawns novelty cyborgs at fixed coordinates on supported maps.

damage_multiplier_changer.title: Damage Multiplier (Changer)
damage_multiplier_changer.description: Admins can modify the damage multiplier for all players or specific teams, useful for balancing gameplay.

delay_skip.title: Delay Skip
delay_skip.shortDescription: Prevent players from skipping the map too early
delay_skip.description: Prevents players from skipping the map too early, useful for custom game modes.

disable_fall_damage.title: Disable Fall Damage
disable_fall_damage.shortDescription: Prevent players from taking fall damage
disable_fall_damage.description: Disables fall damage globally or for specific players, useful for custom game modes.

dynamic_ping_kicker.title: Dynamic Ping Kicker
dynamic_ping_kicker.description: Monitors player ping and kicks players who exceed a configurable threshold, reducing lag for others.

dynamic_score_limit.title: Dynamic Score Limit
dynamic_score_limit.description: Automatically adjusts the score limit based on player count or other factors.

freeze_players.title: Freeze Players
freeze_players.description: Admins can freeze selected players or entire teams, preventing movement or actions.

game_countdown.title: Game Countdown
game_countdown.description: Displays a configurable countdown timer to signal the start of a match or event.

get_object_identity.title: Get Object Identity
get_object_identity.description: Displays the internal IDs and properties of objects in the game world for debugging or scripting.

get_server_name.title: Get Server Name (Example)
get_server_name.description: Demonstrates retrieving the server name programmatically for logging or display purposes.

item_sky_spawner.title: Item Sky Spawner
item_sky_spawner.description: Spawns objects or items from above the map at configurable intervals or locations.

kill_zones.title: Kill Zones
kill_zones.description: Creates designated areas where players instantly die or take damage, for map control or game modes.

liberty_vehicle_spawner.title: Liberty Vehicle Spawner
liberty_vehicle_spawner.shortDescription: Spawn vehicles instantly using chat keywords.
liberty_vehicle_spawner.description: On-demand vehicle spawner with auto-entry, cleanup timers, and multi-vehicle support.

list_players.title: List Players
list_players.description: Shows a list of currently connected players with IDs, teams, and statuses.

live_on_3.title: Live on 3
live_on_3.description: Announces a 'Live on 3' countdown to signal the start of a game or match.

map_list.title: Map List
map_list.shortDescription: View current and upcoming map rotation info.
map_list.description: Displays map cycle details from mapcycle.txt, with commands for current, next, and position-specific maps.

map_list_with_map_spec.title: Map List (with Map Spec)
map_list_with_map_spec.shortDescription: Track map cycle with current and upcoming maps.
map_list_with_map_spec.description: Enhanced map rotation tracker with index control, position-based queries, and real-time progress through mapcycle.txt.

map_skip_tally.title: Map Skip Tally
map_skip_tally.shortDescription: Track and view skip votes per map and player.
map_skip_tally.description: Records and persists skip votes across sessions, with player-specific counts, mode-specific tracking, JSON data persistence, and real-time tally commands.

map_vote_system.title: Map Vote System
map_vote_system.shortDescription: Allow players to vote for next map
map_vote_system.description: Players vote for the next map using a menu or chat commands, with results applied automatically.

mapcycle_manager.title: Mapcycle Manager
mapcycle_manager.description: Manages map cycles with automatic transitions and voting overrides.

multiclient_detector.title: MultiClient Detector
multiclient_detector.description: Identifies players connected from multiple clients to prevent cheating or exploits.

mute_system.title: Mute System
mute_system.description: Admins can mute individual players or entire teams, blocking messages from appearing in chat.

name_ban.title: Name Ban
name_ban.shortDescription: Prevent players from using banned names
name_ban.description: Blocks players from using offensive or restricted names, optionally kicking or banning them.

name_replacer.title: Name Replacer
name_replacer.description: Renames players in real-time based on configured rules to maintain community standards.

no_damage.title: No Damage
no_damage.shortDescription: Toggle invulnerability to prevent player damage.
no_damage.description: Provides a global damage prevention system that allows players to toggle invulnerability.

notify_me.title: Notify Me
notify_me.description: Sends notifications to admins for specific events such as player joins, map changes, or rule violations.

object_spawner.title: Object Spawner
object_spawner.shortDescription: Spawn custom objects with precise positioning and rotation.
object_spawner.description: Enables precise placement of objects on maps, including weapons, vehicles, and other tags.

on_teleport.title: OnTeleport
on_teleport.description: Executes configurable actions when a player teleports, useful for event handling or logging.

ping_checker.title: Ping Checker
ping_checker.description: Periodically checks player ping and logs or warns high-latency connections.

play_time.title: Play Time
play_time.description: Records and displays how long each player has been active on the server.

race_assistant.title: Race Assistant
race_assistant.shortDescription: Enforces vehicle use in race gametypes with warnings and penalties.
race_assistant.description: Monitors players in race gametypes to ensure they enter and stay in vehicles. Features configurable grace periods, visual countdown warnings, safe zones, multi-stage violation handling, and admin exemptions. Supports automated penalties such as kills or kicks for non-compliance.

random_grenades.title: Random Grenades
random_grenades.description: Randomly spawns grenades on the map to increase chaos or fun in custom game modes.

reg_to_play.title: Registration Required to Play
reg_to_play.shortDescription: Enforces mandatory player registration with timed kick enforcement.
reg_to_play.description: Requires all players to register within a configurable time window upon joining. Supports password verification, persistent player data storage, automatic kicks for unregistered players, and permission-based exemptions. Stores registration data in players.txt and optionally saves immediately or at game end.

remove_grenades.title: Remove Grenades (On Spawn)
remove_grenades.description: Removes grenades immediately after spawn to prevent map clutter or unbalanced gameplay.

restart_mapcycle.title: Restart Mapcycle
restart_mapcycle.description: Resets the mapcycle to the first map, optionally applying any voting overrides.

rules_command.title: Rules Command
rules_command.shortDescription: Displays server rules to players via a chat command and periodic announcements.
rules_command.description: Allows players to view server rules using a configurable command. Supports timed announcements to remind players of the rules during gameplay. Features include custom server prefix, adjustable display duration, and easy rule list configuration.

score_handler.title: Score Handler
score_handler.description: Tracks, modifies, and displays player scores with configurable rules and multipliers.

script_manager.title: Script Manager
script_manager.description: Admin utility to manage active scripts, reload changes, and debug script issues in real-time.

seed_score_protection.title: Script Manager
seed_score_protection.shortDescription: Dynamically loads and unloads scripts based on the current map and game mode.
seed_score_protection.description: Automatically manages Lua scripts for each map and game mode. Features include dynamic loading/unloading, error handling, and persistent tracking of active scripts. Ensures only relevant scripts run for a given map/mode combination, improving server efficiency and reducing conflicts.

server_logger.title: Server Logger
server_logger.description: Records server events such as joins, leaves, kills, and commands to files for auditing or analytics.

server_name_changer.title: Server Name Changer
server_name_changer.description: Allows admins to change the server name on the fly, useful for events or branding.

set_respawn_time.title: Set Respawn Time
set_respawn_time.description: Admins can configure respawn timers globally or per team to modify gameplay pacing.

show_admin_names.title: Show Admin Names
show_admin_names.description: Lists currently connected admins in chat or via command for transparency.

simple_poll_system.title: Simple Poll System
simple_poll_system.description: Allows players to vote on options, with results displayed in chat.

spawn_protection.title: Spawn Protection
spawn_protection.description: Grants temporary invincibility to players after spawning to reduce unfair deaths.

status_timer.title: Status Timer
status_timer.description: Displays or logs timers for statuses such as buffs, debuffs, or cooldowns.

suicide_punisher.title: Suicide Punisher
suicide_punisher.description: Applies penalties for players who repeatedly kill themselves to prevent exploits or griefing.

suspend_players.title: Suspend Players
suspend_players.description: Allows admins to suspend player actions, including movement, chat, and attacks, for a configurable duration.

sync_admins.title: Sync Admins
sync_admins.description: Ensures all servers in a network have updated admin lists and permissions.

sync_your_files.title: Sync Your Files
sync_your_files.description: Uploads or updates scripts on the server to match a local repository or file set.

t_slayer_team_spawns.title: T-Slayer Team Spawns
t_slayer_team_spawns.description: Sets custom spawn locations for T-Slayer or similar team-based modes.

team_chat.title: Team Chat
team_chat.description: Enables a separate chat channel for teams, invisible to opponents.

team_color_voting.title: Team Color Voting
team_color_voting.description: Allows players to vote for team colors before match start, applied automatically.

team_shuffler.title: Team Shuffler
team_shuffler.description: Randomly assigns players to teams to maintain fairness and variety in matches.

teleport_manager.title: Teleport Manager
teleport_manager.description: Admins can teleport players individually, in groups, or to preset locations.

the_punisher.title: The Punisher
the_punisher.description: Implements automatic punishments for players breaking configurable rules, including kicks, bans, and score penalties.

timed_server_password.title: Timed Server Password
timed_server_password.shortDescription: Automatically removes the server password after a set duration.
timed_server_password.description: Enables timed server passwords that expire after a configurable duration. Features include optional player notifications, command-based resets, and admin permission enforcement. Ideal for private sessions or timed events where a temporary password is needed.

vehicle_blocker_v1.title: Vehicle Blocker v1
vehicle_blocker_v1.description: Blocks specific vehicles from spawning or being used, configurable by admin.

vehicle_blocker_v2.title: Vehicle Blocker v2
vehicle_blocker_v2.description: Enhanced vehicle blocking with additional options, such as team-specific or temporary blocks.

vote_kick.title: Vote Kick
vote_kick.description: Allows players to initiate votes to kick disruptive players, with configurable thresholds.

vpn_blocker.title: VPN Blocker
vpn_blocker.description: Blocks or warns players connecting via VPN to prevent evasion of bans or multi-accounting.

weapon_assigner.title: Weapon Assigner
weapon_assigner.description: Automatically provides players with specific weapons on spawn or via command.

welcome_messages.title: Welcome Messages
welcome_messages.description: Sends personalized welcome messages to players when they join the server.

word_buster.title: Word Buster
word_buster.description: Advanced multi-lingual chat filter. Detects and removes offensive or banned words in chat messages, optionally replacing them.
